abstract: AT&T has placed in review its media planning and buying account as it seeks to consolidate media chores, now handled by five agencies, at one of them.
snippet: AT&T has placed in review its media planning and buying account as it seeks to consolidate media chores, now handled by five agencies, at one of them.
lead_paragraph: AT&T has placed in review its media planning and buying account as it seeks to consolidate media chores, now handled by five agencies, at one of them.

headline.main: AT&T Prepares to Consolidate Some Ad Assignments
